Params: {3: 'People are gathered around the camp, relaxing after work.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A middle-aged man stands by the vehicle, counting supplies and writing them down.'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: 'What are you doing? If you want to eat, just eat.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A young man squats on the ground, holding a few fruits and turning them over. He licks his lips, then puts them back.'}
{2: 'Refugee 2', 3: "No thanks, I'll wait for the rations.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "We found these food, so we deserve a little something. Take one, and I won't count it in.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He crouches down, grabs the young man's arm, and puts the fruit back in his hands."}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Things are way better now. At least we have a camp and don't have to wander anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Go ahead and eat. Don't be shy—winter's almost over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A cold voice comes from behind, startling the two. They turn around only to find three people appear out of nowhere.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I'm borrowing the vehicle. Tell the logistics guy later.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, they get in the vehicle.'}
{3: 'The engine roars, and the vehicle shakes. Before they know it, something dark flies from the window at the young man.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Eat well, sleep well, and do your job. Don't be pretentious, and don't act like someone who worries about unnecessary things.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "No need to worry about something you shouldn't.", 4: '18'}
{3: "The young man catches what Vanessa throws. By the time he looks up to thank her, the vehicle's gone, leaving only dust."}
{3: "Outside the camp, at the buffer zone's edge, the Red Tide—which should be far away—is surging, encircling the undulating mountain ridges."}
{3: 'The ground shakes, and the trees sway. A little bird loses its footing and falls into the Red Tide.'}
{3: "Something lifts the bird and puts it in the pink-haired woman's hands."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Things changed too fast. You weren't ready either, were you?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ishmael gently tends to the bird's wings, but her eyes drift to something nearby."}
{1: '1', 3: 'A white-haired girl, eyes closed, flickers in and out of view in the Red Tide...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Swirling snowflakes pass through the girl's body as if it were nothing but a shell. Chaos's legs, submerged in the Red Tide, are gradually disappearing.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Looks like this nice doll's about to vanish into the gray and red world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Finally getting a chance to come back, but something's getting in the way... Huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if hearing something, Ishmael turns around, and the bird in her hand takes the chance to free itself and fly into the snow.'}
{3: 'She extends her slender fingertips into the void, and a book quietly materializes, its pages slowly turning.'}
{3: "In the book's projection, an off-road vehicle's parked by an outpost."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I hope... you'll bring more possibilities to the story.", 4: '1'}
{3: "When they arrive, Discord takes them to the watchtower's duty room, turning on the equipment and explaining her report."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'When I left, Marker Six was gone, and the tide was about a kilometer from Marker Five...', 4: '2'}
{3: "The duty room's only screen—a patchwork of parts of various models—slowly lights up, showing that most of the grid-divided surveillance feeds are down."}
{3: 'The working feeds show a creepy scene—snowflakes melting into the tide, turning into a horrifying red expanse.'}
{3: 'Seeing your stunned faces, Discord quickly corrects herself.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Now, it's about a kilometer from Marker Four now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Can't say. We're stretched thin—this many markers are all we can handle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Also, for some reason, the filters aren't protecting us from the Hetero-Creatures anymore. They're even attacking the filters that they used to avoid at all costs.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'The only good news is we got the Central Purification Filter core for Marker Three back.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The small room feels tense. Vanessa makes a quick decision.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Discord, take 【kuroname】 back to camp. Tell Rosa what's happening and get them ready to move.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Something's causing the Red Tide to surge. I need samples.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "We won't be safe anywhere if we don't know what's going on.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa explains while shutting down and taking apart the equipment.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Take this too. We're running low on supplies.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Discord leaves, carrying a monitor and tangled cables in her arms.'}
{2: "It just doesn't make sense to me.", 3: '111'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Everyone needs to do their job. I'm stronger than Discord here, so I'll take the risk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Have you already forgotten what I said? Stop worrying. This isn't your business.", 4: '1'}
{2: "The Red Tide's surging. It's definitely stronger.", 3: '114'}
{2: 'Can your M.I.N.D. shield keep us completely safe?', 3: '115'}
{2: "But keeping your M.I.N.D. stable isn't your problem either.", 3: '118'}
{3: 'With that, you start a M.I.N.D. link with the Construct in front of you.'}
{3: 'Vanesa wants to say something but halts. Eventually, she taps her earpiece.'}
{3: 'Soon, engine sounds come from under the watchtower.'}
{3: 'Barely dodging the attack of a Herero-Creature, Vanessa keeps backing away as vital fluid trickles down her wounds all over her body.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The Red Tide's getting stronger, and these vermin are getting bolder...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vanessa winces in pain as she raises her knife to block a Hetero-Creature attacking from the side.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The air's so thick with the Punishing Virus it's practically dripping. If this keeps up...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The Hetero-Creature's form multiplies into overlapping afterimages in her visual module, with one image after another relentlessly rushing toward her."}
{3: 'The feeble bullets barely scratch the creatures, just feeding them in an instant.'}
{3: 'A piercing scream suddenly heads your way.'}
{3: "Vanessa wipes the blood from her visual module, firing as she blocks the creature's claws behind her."}
{1: 'Deep M.I.N.D. connection established, maximizing Mind Beacon output power', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Deep M.I.N.D. connection established, maximizing Mind Beacon output power'}
{3: 'The blood mist in her M.I.N.D. clears, and she quickly slashes the creature.'}
{3: 'After killing several, the rest retreat into the Red Tide.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Hey, if I knew the Deep M.I.N.D. connection helped this much, why didn't we do it sooner?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She turns to complain, then her eyes widen—'}
{3: 'You have passed out behind her, slumping down behind the rocks.'}
{3: 'Your mind goes fuzzy as something cold injects into your body...'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'You better not die, or this undiluted rare serum will be wasted.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She grabs water out of her bag and holds it to your lips.'}
{3: 'She looks at your shabby combat suit.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "This crap can't protect you from the Punishing Virus anymore... At the very least, it's useless against the Mutated Red Tide now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The Punishing Virus concentration's up, and your suit can't handle this Mutated Red Tide. Even the diluted serums I gave you didn't help much.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Luckily, we kept some undiluted doses for patrols, or else...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "I got the Red Tide samples from the center, but we're still stuck in this contaminated forest with no way to move.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two of you are stuck in the Red Tide-contaminated forest, in dead silence.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Feeling better? We need to go. Your suit can't endure another attack.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Slowly, you get up and check if you can walk normally before heading back the way you came while avoiding the Mutated Red Tide.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As Rosa requested, Vanessa takes Red Tide samples from two more places. Strangely, she falls into silence, holding the translucent container.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "We're pretty far from the center... but the Punishing Virus concentration's still the same.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A few words are enough to tell the dire situation.'}
{3: 'She turns around silently, the translucent sampler in her hand revealing a terrifying sight.'}
{3: 'The crimson liquid is eating the white buffer, turning it into food.'}
{3: "The red water shivers, as if it's reacting to something..."}
{3: 'The red water suddenly shoots up, then disappears abruptly before Vanessa can react.'}
{3: 'The waters slowly part, revealing a pale doll-like figure standing within the tide.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'What exactly happened with the Red Tide?', 3: '274', 4: 'What happened to you?', 5: '274'}
{3: "As you utter your question, you try to make out Chaos's features—her body is gradually melting into the Red Tide, starting from her legs and creeping upward.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'A consuming agony instantly crawls up your spine, as if you yourself were the one trapped within the Red Tide.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The doll mechanically repeats the same answer, as if another entirely different <phonetic=Agent Zero>"face"</phonetic> is gradually emerging within her.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: "Her shape starts to change, as if she can't hold back the Red Tide's power—", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: "The Mutated Red Tide suddenly surges, its waves like a monster's open jaws, ready to swallow them both."}
{3: 'Vanessa tackles you with a leap, sending you both rolling toward the shore.'}
{3: 'You jump up, grabbing the sampling gear to shield yourselves, but it ends up in vain.'}
{3: 'Even as Vanessa charges into the Red Tide, she looks no larger than a hummingbird before the towering waves.'}
{3: 'The red blade falls, and death closes in—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With your mind overwhelmed by the Punishing Virus, you see a small red wing appear between you and the surging Red Tide just before you pass out.', 4: '1'}
